full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 747 Filed 08/10/22 Page 220 of 228 896 LC2Qmax7 - corrected Alessi - Direct 1 Q. Forgive me. I don't think I asked. Where do you remember finding these massagers after Mr. Epstein's massages? 2 A. I would find by the sink or in the couch -- there was a couch in the bathroom -- or on top of the table or at his bed. 3 Q. When you say the table, what do you mean? 4 A. The massage table. 5 Q. What, if any, photographs do you remember seeing in Mr. Epstein's Palm Beach house while you worked for him? 6 A. It was a lot of photographs with important people from -- or Ms. Maxwell with Mr. Epstein. I remember seeing many important people photographed with them. 7 Q. Who are some of the important people you remember seeing in photographs with Ms. Maximum and Mr. Epstein in the Palm Beach residence? 8 A. I think there was a photograph with Mr. Trump. Photographs with -- if I remember, I think there was a photograph with the Pope. I think there was a photograph with Fidel Castro. 9 Q. What, if any, photographs do you remember seeing that contained females who were topless? 10 A. There were many photographs with females topless. Usually they were kept at Ms. Maxwell's desk. 11 Q. Remind us where that desk was. 12 A. The desk was at the garden room behind the pantry. 13 Q. Based on your observations of those photographs, where do they appear to have been taken? 14 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00012505

I would find by the sink or in the couch -- there was a couch in the bathroom -- or on top of the table or at his bed. 3 Q. When you say the table, what do you mean? 4 A. The massage table. 5 Q. What, if any, photographs do you remember seeing in Mr. Epstein's Palm Beach house while you worked for him? 6 A. It was a lot of photographs with important people from -- or Ms. Maxwell with Mr. Epstein. I remember seeing many important people photographed with them. 7 Q. Who are some of the important people you remember seeing in photographs with Ms. Maximum and Mr. Epstein in the Palm Beach residence? 8 A. I think there was a photograph with Mr. Trump. Photographs with -- if I remember, I think there was a photograph with the Pope. I think there was a photograph with Fidel Castro. 9 Q. What, if any, photographs do you remember seeing that contained females who were topless? 10 A. There were many photographs with females topless. Usually they were kept at Ms. Maxwell's desk. 11 Q. Remind us where that desk was. 12 A. The desk was at the garden room behind the pantry. 13 Q. Based on your observations of those photographs, where do they appear to have been taken?
